## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Responsive/UI improvement
- [ ] Performance optimization
- [ ] Documentation update

## Testing Checklist

### Functional Testing
- [ ] All features work as expected
- [ ] No console errors or warnings
- [ ] API integrations working correctly
- [ ] Forms validate and submit properly
- [ ] Navigation works across all pages

### Responsive Testing
**Breakpoints tested:**
- [ ] Mobile (320px - 599px)
- [ ] Tablet (600px - 991px)
- [ ] Desktop (992px+)

**Attach screenshots for:**
- [ ] Home page at 320px, 768px, 1200px
- [ ] Cards listing at 320px, 768px, 1200px
- [ ] Card details at 320px, 768px, 1200px
- [ ] Any modified pages/components

**Attach GIFs/videos for:**
- [ ] Hamburger menu interaction
- [ ] Filter drawer on mobile
- [ ] Comparison flow (add cards → compare → view details)
- [ ] Any complex interactions changed

### Accessibility Testing
- [ ] All interactive elements keyboard accessible
- [ ] Focus indicators visible
- [ ] ARIA labels on icon-only buttons
- [ ] Semantic HTML (headings, landmarks)
- [ ] Color contrast meets WCAG AA (4.5:1)
- [ ] Screen reader tested (optional but recommended)
- [ ] axe DevTools scan: 0 critical violations

### Performance Testing
- [ ] Lighthouse score (Mobile): Performance ≥85, Accessibility 100
- [ ] Images optimized (lazy loading, srcset, WebP)
- [ ] No layout shifts (CLS score)
- [ ] Animations use CSS transforms
- [ ] `prefers-reduced-motion` respected

### Cross-Browser Testing
- [ ] Chrome (latest)
- [ ] Safari (latest)
- [ ] Firefox (latest)
- [ ] Edge (latest)

## Reviewer Checklist
- [ ] Code follows project conventions
- [ ] Changes are well-tested
- [ ] Documentation updated if needed
- [ ] No unnecessary console logs
- [ ] Responsive design verified
- [ ] Accessibility standards met
